# Radio ```tsx import {Radio} from '@gravity-ui/uikit'; ``` The `Radio` component allows the users to select a single option from a list of choices. ## States Radio can have the following states: - Checked: Radio is selected. - Disabled: Radio is unavailable for selection. ```tsx ``` ## Size To manage the `Radio` size, use the `size` property. The default size is `m`. ```tsx ``` ## Label You can set a label for the `Radio` component using the `content` property or pass it as a child property. ```tsx
Content as children

Provides checked value as a callback argument. | `(checked: boolean) => void` | | | onChange | Fires when the radio state is changed by the user.
